data.event: Fairfield Post Office opened on 21 February 1887.

event.title: that year, it and Alphington became

data.event: In that year, it and Alphington became part of the City of Northcote, which, in 1994 became part of the City of Darebin.
In that year, it and Alphington became part of the City of Northcote, which, in 1994 became part of the City of Darebin.
It also features a three-storey hotel, the Grandview Hotel, completed in 1888.

event.title: was granted by the Licensing Court on 15 August 1888

data.event: License was granted by the Licensing Court on 15 August 1888.
